content: row 2 2 2 2 1 - more times you have been making one increase on every second row for sleeve sides of raglans and one increase on every 4th row for front and back sides of raglans page 1 buttercup by heidi kirrmaier version 6 updated for cast-on st august 23 2009 for all sizes except xl and xxl next rs row k all next row p all next row as row 4 next row p all repeat last 4 row 0 0 0 1 - - more times stitch count xs back = 78 each sleeve = 48 each front piece = 15 s back = 84 each sleeve = 50 each front piece = 16 m back= 92 each sleeve = 54 each front piece = 18 l back = 96 each sleeve = 56 each front piece = 18 xl back = 106 each sleeve = 62 each front piece = 22 xxl back= 112 each sleeve = 66 each front piece = 24 on another circular needle of same size with a new ball of yarn cast on snugly using regular long tail method 42 42 44 46 48 50 stitches and cut yarn leaving a few inches put aside next row rs of main piece k to 4th marker which is at front right raglan seam call this marker x sm p to end then instead of turning around purl across the new cast on stitches on the separate needle sliding stitches to other end so you are starting on the end with no tails and continue purling to next marker left front underarm call this marker a sm this now marks the beginning of a round as you will continue from here knitting in the round you should have 72 74 80 82 92 98 stitches between marker x and marker a first full round k all next round starting after marker a kfb k to 1 st before next marker kfb sm 3 times p to end back to marker a the kfb s in this round should have made an increase at the back body and each sleeve side of raglans on the 4th row after last increase row there will be no more raglan increases made on the front soon to be lace part next round k all next round k all next round k to marker x sm k0 1 4 5 1 4 k2 decrease 3 times yo k1 6 times k2 decrease 3 times 4 4 4 4 5 5 times k0 1 4 5 1 4 next round kfb k to 1 st before next marker kfb sm 3 times p to end repeat last 4 rounds 3 3 3 4 4 5 more times next round k all next round k to marker x p to end separate body and sleeves place sleeve stitches between first 2 markers on scrap yarn cast on 4 6 8 10 12 14 stitches and at the same time
